events.name: Oklahoma State Cowboys at Notre Dame Fighting Irish
Utah Utes at Ohio State Buckeyes

notes.headline: Rose Bowl Game Pres. by Capital One Venture X

headlines.description: — C.J. Stroud and Jaxon Smith-Njigba put on a passing performance that obliterated a multitude of records during one of the biggest offensive days in Ohio State's storied history.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 7 Ohio State beats No. 10 Utah 48-45 in wild Rose Bowl

video.headline: Stroud's 6 TDs, Smith-Njigba's big game propel Ohio State to Rose Bowl win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Stroud’s 6 TDs, Smith-Njigba’s big game propel Ohio State to Rose Bowl win) 2022/01/01 ESHEET SOTFULL

events.name: Baylor Bears at Ole Miss Rebels

headlines.description: — A Sugar Bowl showdown against Mississippi and coach Lane Kiffin's explosive, Southeastern Conference-leading offense provided a high-profile platform for Baylor to validate its old-school formula of ball control and aggressive defense.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 6 Baylor tops No. 8 Ole Miss in Sugar Bowl; Corral hurt

video.headline: Baylor's defense comes up big in Sugar Bowl victory

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Baylor’s defense comes up big in Sugar Bowl victory) 2022/01/02 ESHEET SOTFULL

events.name: Penn State Nittany Lions at Arkansas Razorbacks

headlines.description: — Arkansas football is on the rise.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jefferson leads No. 22 Arkansas over Penn State 24-10

video.headline: Razorbacks defeat Penn State in the Outback Bowl
